title: Need help with game!
body: My launcher started the optimizing process when I opened League up in the nvidia geforce program, but now it requires that I download something whenever I open the launcher and wont let me go back to the normal launcher. It's making me use a lot of download and as I am on holiday I have mobile broadband and cant afford to waste any more download. Is there any way to revert the optimizing process back to the normal launcher?
